mapper.insert: insert into g_goods_report (GOODS_ID, MONTH_SALES, COUNT_SALES, COUNT_COMMS, COMMEND_SCORE) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monthSales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countSales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countComms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commendScore,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select GOODS_ID, MONTH_SALES, COUNT_SALES, COUNT_COMMS, COMMEND_SCORE from g_goods_report
